annotation.TEXT: Alright, so we've got a sad-looking mushroom, a flower doing something weird with its mouth, a sleeping Luigi, what looks like a peach, and a happy jittery star!
Change "invaded" to "overrun".
Remove the "d" from "noticed" here.
(I don't know why I lingered on this message for so long. Probably just to make sure I was reading it right.)
No, wait! It's no trouble! I said I'll be glad to help! (Please don't make Mario the hero yet again!)
Alright, now for Firstep Village.
Add a "t" to change "though" into "thought" here.
Nope, running speed failed me. However, I saw some Goombas to the right, so...
Change "restore" into "restoring" here.
Change "is" to "his" here.
Sorry, I'm not Mario, but I'm just as strong, and I'll be glad to help you out! (I deserve to be the protagonist more often anyway!)
Oh, no! That must be... The Evil Guy!
Add an "s" to "sound" to make "sounds" here.
Alright, let's move on.

Alright, so I may not have done much in the way of levels, but it's already been over 11 minutes thanks to all that story dialogue. So, next time, I'll head to some hopefully more action-packed levels, starting with Dinosaur Land!
So, I guess I spin jump into the bottom of an arrow block to skip 4 tracks, but since I only have 3 unlocked right now, it'll be the same as advancing only 1 track.
Add an "n" to change "unknow" into "unknown" here. Also, remove the "sealed" just after "power.
Oh, and just to rub in this fact, there are four useless mushrooms in this house.
Huh. I was wondering if that skull was a death counter. I guess this means I won't have to keep track of my "demos" in this hack!
Add an "n" to change "unknow" into "unknown" again.
Nuts. Only 30.
Remove the "s" to change "lives" into "live".
Perhaps add a comma after "luck" here.
Also, best name for an evil guy, ever.
Let's check out Bonus next.
Hello, this is SomeGuy712x, and welcome to me playing something else, which is titled...
Well, that's fine, because I get to be the hero now! Whoo-hoo! ...Ahem, I mean... Well, while I'm here, I guess I could try to help you all out.
Huh. So it appears that I only have three songs unlocked right now. However, I don't think I've heard the "Decisive Here We Go" elsewhere in this hack yet...
Ahh! Bears! Where's the big bad wolf when you need him? ...Oh, wait. I think I'm getting my fairy tales confused here.
Hey there Mr. Smiley Face Stick Figure Man Guy. How's it going?
Ah, roasted enemies still become coins in this hack. Some hacks change it so that the enemies just die, but I think I prefer seeing my burnt enemies become cash.
Oh, great. More bears. Guess I'd better talk to everyone. I wouldn't want to miss a typo.
Ha! Good enough! Oh, but I have no idea what this guy is saying. Anyone care to translate all this? (Thanks go to thePworks and WhiteYoshiEgg for the translation.)
...Or you'll just get Luigi instead.
...Umm... Oookay... I'll just leave you two to your discussion then...
Change "statut" to "status" here.
Alright, thanks for the warning.
Remove the "d" from "captured" here.
Now, why don't more NPCs in games ask these kinds of questions when the hero barges into their houses?
Perhaps change the first "What" to "Wait".
BGM: Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga - Title Screen
...Or not. Mr. Nvisiblewall (must be a relative of Mr. Essagebox) is blocking my path right now, and I guess he won't get out of my way until I clear the special world.
Hello! I just found a secret passage!
The last sentence here sounds like a Link's Awakening reference.
Change "PUNishement" to "PUNishment" by removing the first "e".
Also, change "musics" to "songs" or "tracks".
LOL. (I wonder how Goron50 and his buddy Bear would react to this message?)
Ah, so this gate you were talking about is a goal point. Let's see if running speed can get me a high star total...
There. We're all ready to go now. Oh, and nothing else happens on the title screen, in case you were wondering. And, I bet I know why there isn't a number of players choice...
Change the comma after "room" into a period, and capitalize "hear". Also, change "music" on the fourth line to "song".
Nah, the summon magic is gonna malfunction and you'll just end up with a level 1 Etna, downgraded from level 1000 due to the botched summon.
Ooh, frozen blocks that I can thaw with fireballs.
Add a comma after "No", an add an "e" to change "you'r" into "you're" here.

Alright, so this hack was made by yogui, and I guess it's still technically in beta, as I was asked to beta-test it by Footsteps_of_Coins on SMW Central. So, let's see here... I can pick from one of three files, or I can erase data. Just to be absolutely sure I'm starting fresh, I'll just erase each file multiple times here...

Okay, so I can choose from Scenario-- Whoa, hello! Well, looks like I found a secret already! So, as I was saying, I can choose from Scenario, Bonus, or Firstep Village. I'll start with Scenario first, as was suggested by the intro message.
Moon count: 2 (Nah, just kidding!)
Oh, so you're actually called "Mr. Essagebox". Alright, I'll keep that in mind.
Ooh, mushroom. The classic plumber embiggener.
Add a space between "spin" and "jump" here.
Can't jump on the furniture. Oh, well.
Change this "a" to "an".
Also, remove the "a" just before "good luck".
Are there any hidden blocks around here? ...No? Maybe I'm supposed to come back with a cape or Yoshi (assuming those are even in this hack).
Alright, it's bearded bear time!

Yeah, so it looks like Luigi's gonna be the star of the show here, so that would be why the number of players choice isn't there. Also, there are invisible walls preventing you from reaching those items in the intro there.
Huh... I wonder how I'm supposed to reach that bear up there? I can't jump on the house, I don't think...
Cirno's pretty strong. Let's ask her!
I guess I'd better pay attention for such levels in the future.
BGM: Custom - Project Emotion
Maybe change the period after "Amazing, isn't it" to a question mark.
Yeah, it seems strange for there to be these cold blocks arbitrarily here.
Hmm... I think I might've played a game by that name at some point in the past...
"Little cute skull".
Hmm... That shadow's shape looks familiar, but it's probably just my imagination. There's no way it could be who I think it looks like.
Maybe change "Mister" to "mister", or "sage" to "Sage" (but not both).
To be continued... (And I'm just gonna sit here for a little while so you can hear this overworld music in full.)

Wait... All this time, Mario and Luigi have been eating the fire flowers?! And the flowers "make" them throw fireballs? I thought throwing fireballs was mostly up to the will of the person holding the controller... Oh, but fireballs come out automatically if you spin jump, so there's that.
Remove the "d" to change "cared" into "care" here.
Uh, oh! Danger music!
Remove the "ed" from "played" here.
Add an "s" to change "require" into "requires".

Wow, that was a lot of story. Well, now we've got the gist of what's going on. We need to defeat The Evil Guy before he unseals some legendary sealed power to destroy everything, and rescue the bearded bear in order to be able to return home.
Goal tape average so far: 30 / 1 = 30 stars each.
..."Something else"!
Huh? Nothing in this house at all?
Add a period after "Mr" here.
Time to start pointing out typos! If I miss any, let me know!
Oh, I don't know if I'd call that thing cute.
...Umm... Okay, I kind of had to know at least a couple of those things in order to reach and talk to you in the first place.
Change "that" to "their".
Change "teleport" to "summon".
BGM: Final Fantasy IV - Mystic Mysidia
Change "begin" to "begins", or to "began" if limited space is a problem.
Alright, I get to grab this flower and start incinerating stuff!
Add an "s" to change "level" into "levels" here.
The music room's a neat idea, I guess. Now, let's see what's beyond those brown blocks on the right...
I will call it dead now, though.
Oh, is this the title screen of Super Mario All-Stars?
Umm... I have no idea what you're even talking about.
BGM: Secret of the Stars - Kustera Overworld
Can I get another mushroom? Yeah, but it doesn't do anything, so I guess this hack doesn't use the reserve item box.
Capitalize "Pokemon" here. And since the "é" apparently exists in the text in this hack, spell it "Pokémon". Also, capitalize "Trainer".
Add an "s" to change "say" into "says" here, or change "A legend" into "Legends".
"Dear mister with the elegant mustache, I congratulate you on managing to talk to me. Good luck for the rest of your journey."
Alright, so let's check out the music room.
Add an "s" to change "block" into "blocks", and put a space between "spin" and "jump" here.
Change the "at" here to "to".
Ooh, guaranteed bonus life since my bonus stars and the timer were both zero at the time.
Change the "is" after "gate" to "lies".
Oh, yeah. I guess Mario's pretty strong too. However, looking at the "Luigi" in my status bar, I have a feeling Mario's not going to be coming to these bears' aid...
And pluralize this "level" here too.
BGM: Super Mario All-Stars - Game Select
Oh, it's no problem. I'll teach The Evil Guy not to be so evil!
